title: Lengths
text: The length of the leg opposite of A is $$a=9$$, the length of the leg adjacent to A is $$b=40$$, and the length of the hypotenuse is $$c=41$$.
speech: The length of the leg opposite of A is  a is equal to 9 , the length of the leg adjacent to A is  b, is equal to 40 , and the length of the hypotenuse is  c, is equal to 41 .
